title: Adobe Acrobat
content:
The primary application for creating and modifying [PDF](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010211033/http:/typophile.com/wiki/PDF) files. Though it is a retail product, Acrobat also features a free version called Acrobat Reader, which can be downloaded [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010211033/http:/www.adobe.com/products/acrobat/readstep2.html).

More about Adobe Acrobat [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010211033/http:/www.adobe.com/products/acrobat/).
author: cheshiredave
